tutorial.taxCalculationDesc: Automatically calculate fuel tax owed or credits by jurisdiction
tutorial.stateBreakdownDesc: View mileage and fuel gallons by state/province for reporting

tutorial.tipFilterVehicle: Filter by vehicle to see individual truck IFTA data

upgrade.featureExportReports: Export quarterly IFTA reports in PDF format

fuelSync.title: Sync Fuel Data
fuelSync.description: Import fuel entries from Fuel Tracker
fuelSync.errorMessage: Failed to analyze fuel purchase data. Please try again.
fuelSync.noFuelDataMessage: No fuel purchase data was found for this quarter. IFTA requires fuel purchase records by state.
fuelSync.noFuelDataVehicle: No fuel purchase records found for vehicle {{vehicle}} in this quarter.
fuelSync.fuelRecorded: You have recorded {{gallons}} gallons of fuel in {{states}} states for this quarter.
fuelSync.fuelRecordedVehicle: Vehicle {{vehicle}} has {{gallons}} gallons of fuel recorded in {{states}} states.
fuelSync.fuelDataInfo: Fuel purchase records are essential for IFTA reporting. You should have fuel receipts for each state where you purchase fuel.
fuelSync.useFuelTracker: Use the Fuel Tracker to enter all your fuel purchases properly categorized by state.
fuelSync.mayTakeMoments: This may take a few moments

summary.title: IFTA Summary
summary.addTripsAndFuel: Add trips and fuel data to see your IFTA summary
summary.reportingInfo: This summary shows total miles driven and fuel gallons purchased by jurisdiction. Use this data to complete your quarterly IFTA tax return. Be sure to keep all fuel receipts and trip records for your files.
summary.failedToExport: Failed to export report. Please try again.
